name: Arsenal Advertising
tagline: STAND FOR GOOD. BRAND FOR GOOD.
description: Founded by a dynamic sibling team – one with a passion for the creative and one with a gift for client relations – the agency grew out of a simple idea: doing good work for good clients. Since 2005, Anne Marie Scharrer and Jonathan Smith have been building good brands, taking names, and working to evolve the humble firm into the mighty boutique agency it is today.
